bill.title: Traffic Infractions; Rental Motor Vehicles
bill.description: Requires that the owner of a rental motor vehicle, upon notice that the rental motor vehicle has been involved in a traffic incident resulting in a violation, provide the court with the name and address of the lessee within 45 days of the mailing of the notice to the lessor and registered driver of the vehicle. Effective upon approval. Effective July 1, 2010. (HB869 CD1)
